meanings.definition: A small North American diving duck with a large head and a white patch on the back of its head.
meanings.sent1: The bufflehead gracefully dove into the water to catch fish.
meanings.sent2: I saw a beautiful bufflehead swimming in the pond.
meanings.sent3: The bufflehead duck decided to show off its diving skills to the other ducks.
meanings.sent4: Her hair resembled a bufflehead's head, with a striking white patch.
meanings.sent5: The children were amazed by the colorful bufflehead at the zoo.

meanings.definition: To move one's head in a nodding or jerking motion.
meanings.sent1: She buffleheaded in agreement with a big smile on her face.
meanings.sent2: The music was so catchy that everyone started to bufflehead along.
meanings.sent3: The robot buffleheaded as part of its programmed dance routine.
meanings.sent4: The tree branches buffleheaded in the wind, looking like they were dancing.
meanings.sent5: The bobblehead doll seemed to bufflehead every time someone touched it.
